As project manager you might want to setup multiple milestones during a year and work with multiple teams. A deeper hierarchy than "Release -> Iteration" is needed.

  • Open Plan Properties of "Version 1.0" and rename your plan to current year while being in edit mode
  • Create new sub release "MS 1" (Parent of MS 1 should be previously changed year release)
  • Create below "MS1" 2 sub releases "Team 1" and "Team 2" as displayed on image above
  • We still have to move our existing iteration(s) into our team space. Select "Iteration 1", open Properties and change "Parent" atribute to "Team_1"
  • Save your changes and refresh your browser window to see your updated structure
